resources.string: Welcome to the official IM Showcase app, through this app you can browse projects & vote for the one you think most deserves the audience favourite award.
Scan the QR code placed next to each person at the in-person event. If you cannot attend, don’t worry! You can still browse projects via the project screen.

You haven’t voted for any projects yet... To vote for the audience favourite award, find a project you like and click the vote button. If you are attending the showcase in-person you can also scan the QR code next to the project to be taken to it’s page in the app.
